# gemseo-pyoptsparse


[![PyPI - License](https://img.shields.io/pypi/l/gemseo-pyoptsparse)](https://www.gnu.org/licenses/lgpl-3.0.en.html)
[![PyPI - Python Version](https://img.shields.io/pypi/pyversions/gemseo-pyoptsparse)](https://pypi.org/project/gemseo-pyoptsparse/)
[![PyPI](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/gemseo-pyoptsparse)](https://pypi.org/project/gemseo-pyoptsparse/)
[![Codecov branch](https://img.shields.io/codecov/c/gitlab/gemseo:dev/gemseo-pyoptsparse/develop)](https://app.codecov.io/gl/gemseo:dev/gemseo-pyoptsparse)

## Overview

GEMSEO interface to pyoptsparse algorithms.

## Installation

This plugin requires the package `pyoptsparse` with `SNOPT` support.
It shall be installed beforehand.

Install the latest version with `pip install gemseo-pyoptsparse`.

See [pip](https://pip.pypa.io/en/stable/getting-started/) for more information.

## Bugs and questions

Please use the [gitlab issue tracker](https://gitlab.com/gemseo/dev/gemseo-pyoptsparse/-/issues)
to submit bugs or questions.

## Contributing

See the [contributing section of GEMSEO](https://gemseo.readthedocs.io/en/stable/software/developing.html#dev).
